channel.title: Dr on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Dr on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Zerto: Or What I Learned at Tech Field Day #6!
item.description: The last day of Tech Field Day #6 myself and all the other delegates were lucky enough to get a sneak peek at stealth startup ‘Zerto’. We weren’t allowed to talk about it until the 22nd and I know I am a little slow on the punch but I currently haven’t seen a lot of coverage. Just for an initial disclosure statement my trip to Tech Field Day 6 was paid for by the vendors we visited, however, I am in no way obligated to write about them or publicize them in any manner.
